ch.aplu.ev3

Class TemperatureSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.aplu.ev3.Part
      • ch.aplu.ev3.Sensor
        • ch.aplu.ev3.I2CSensor
          • ch.aplu.ev3.TemperatureSensor

  • public class TemperatureSensor
extends I2CSensor
    Class that represents the Lego NXT temperature sensor (9749). The device is built up with the TMP275 digital sensor from Burr-Brown (Texas Instruments). As specified by the manufacturer the temperature range is -55 .. 128 degrees Celsius. The accuracy is +-0.5 degrees in range -20 to 100 degrees and the the resolution is 0.0625 degrees (in 12 bit mode used here).

      Creates a sensor instance connected to the given port.
